game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: Embark on a journey to explore treacherous lands and uncover the lost artifact to prove your worthiness.

task.objective: Travel to the Ruins of Eldoria
task.description: You must reach the ancient ruins in the heart of the forest to begin your search.
A powerful beast guards the artifact. Conquer it to proceed.
